price: Na Mola wako Mlezi anayajua yaliyo ficha vifua vyao, na wanayo yatangaza.
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Mtume! Mola wako Mlezi anajua baraabara yaliomo katika vifua vya washirikina ya uadui wao juu yako, na wanayo tangaza kwa ndimi zao ya kukushutumu na kukupinga kwa ulivyo teuliwa kupewa Utume.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: warabbuka yaʿlamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wamā yuʿ'linūna
